description: Defines a JPA entity for beacon-based marketing/assistance offers within the airport facility service platform.

classes.name: BeaconOfferEntity
classes.description: Represents a beacon offer with details such as ID, beacon identification, message, active status, and timestamps.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the UUID identifier of the beacon offer.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the UUID identifier of the beacon offer.

methods.name: getBeaconId
methods.description: Returns the beacon ID associated with the offer.

methods.name: setBeaconId
methods.description: Sets the beacon ID associated with the offer.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the offer.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the offer.

methods.name: getMessage
methods.description: Returns the message content of the offer.

methods.name: setMessage
methods.description: Sets the message content of the offer.

methods.name: getStartAt
methods.description: Returns the start time of the offer.

methods.name: setStartAt
methods.description: Sets the start time of the offer.

methods.name: getEndAt
methods.description: Returns the end time of the offer.

methods.name: setEndAt
methods.description: Sets the end time of the offer.

methods.name: isActive
methods.description: Checks if the offer is active.

methods.name: setActive
methods.description: Sets the active status of the offer.

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.description: Returns the metadata JSON string associated with the offer.

methods.name: setMetadata
methods.description: Sets the metadata JSON string for the offer.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the offer.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp of the offer.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the last updated timestamp of the offer.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the last updated timestamp of the offer.
